message: Thought Shifting is intended to help you interrupt the unhelpful thoughts that make you angry before you do or say something you'll regret.
The key is to interrupt your thinking and say a phrase to yourself in the heat of the moment to counteract those angry thoughts before you get into trouble.
You can also use thought shifting to prepare yourself before you go into a risky situation.
There is no one right thing to say to yourself when you interrupt unhelpful angry thoughts.
But, with practice, you can find phrases that work well for you!
